summary: Frontend testing complete for Brackett Agency website with updated brand style guide. All 7 features tested pass: Hero image displays on right, dark sections have white text for proper contrast, no broken images, all navigation links work, gold CTAs visible and clickable, mobile navigation functions correctly, Brand & Design approach section has readable text.
passed_tests: Home page hero renders correctly with business strategy image on right (x position: 984px)
All dark sections (navy backgrounds) have white/gold text for proper contrast - no navy text on navy bg
No broken image links - all images across all 8 pages load successfully
All 8 navigation links work (Home, How We Work, Solutions, Brand & Design, Intelligence, Insights, About, Contact)
Gold CTAs are visible and clickable (hero-cta-primary, hero-cta-secondary, nav-cta)
Mobile navigation toggle works correctly and displays all 8 page links
Brand & Design approach section has readable text (white text on navy background)
Technology section on Home page has proper white text on navy background
Footer displays correctly with navy background
context_for_next_testing_agent: Brand style guide updates verified: Navy Blue (#1A2B4A) headers/nav, Refined Gold (#C9A961) CTAs, Inter font typography, professional business images added, emojis removed, proper white text contrast on dark backgrounds. All 8 pages tested with correct data-testid attributes. JotForm links (https://form.jotform.com/252728460666061) are correctly configured on all CTAs.
